attributes.action: Scrap all Congestion Charges and Ultra Low Emission Charges during the pandemic
attributes.additional_details:
So people can go to work without being restricted. I.e Nhs, Security, etc essential workers.

So they can help others and attend locations quickly.
attributes.background: Stop all Congestion Charges and Ultra Low Emission Charges during the coronavirus pandemic So people can go to work without being restricted. I.e Nhs, Security, etc essential workers

rejection.details:
Road charging schemes such as congestion charges are the responsibility of local councils, not the UK Government or Parliament. In London, this is the responsibility of the London Assembly. 

You can petition them directly: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
